entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (collections_ice_cream_part_two.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: Hah...that must be an antique.  Try selling it to the local junk dealer.  I bet you'll get a decent price.
entries.s_12: Actually, I was hoping to fix it.
entries.s_14: I doubt that would be the best way to approach getting a working fryer.  Take my advice and reverse engineer it and have a new one crafted.
entries.s_16: Any idea how I might do that?
entries.s_18: Sure.  I see you have much of the broken fryer intact.  All you have to do is get a bit of detailed information for all the pieces and store it in your datapad.  Once you have enough data you can create a schematic and give it to a trader to craft.
entries.s_19: Hmmmm. Which piece should I start with?
entries.s_20: See those tongs in there?  Those are the fryer tongs and are used to lift food out of the fryer.  You are basically looking at a piece of bent metal with a handle.  Pretty simple.
entries.s_22: Oh.  I see.  But what about the other pieces?
entries.s_24: You might want to speak with Mikfa Faaus for other parts.  I will give you his current location.  I am much too busy to help you any further.
entries.s_26: I'm sorry but I am busy right now. If you can place your order with the order droid I will get to you as soon as possible.
entries.s_4: I'm sorry but I am busy right now. Place your order with the order droid.
entries.s_9: Oh.  Are you off soon? I was sent here by Hunde Decan...it is regarding this fryer.
